function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuous spread of the virus","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus leading to more infections","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict health and safety protocols, testing, and monitoring","Technologies":"Temperature monitoring devices, contact tracing apps","People":"Construction workers, site personnel, general public","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Supply chain complications and logistic bottlenecks","Impact":"Disruption of material supply and project timelines","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, advanced inventory management systems","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, IoT sensors for real-time tracking","People":"Project managers, procurement teams, suppliers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, suppliers"},{"Description":"Workforce issues and labor shortage","Impact":"Decreased workerpower, shortage of labor, and health risks for workers","Mitigation":"Enforcement of proper health and safety precautions, training for virus containment","Technologies":"Virtual training platforms, automated health screening systems","People":"Construction workers, labor unions, site managers","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers, labor unions"}]}
